summary: Email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York to attorneys Chris and Mark regarding their representation of Ghislaine Maxwell and arranging a meeting to discuss the SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Email correspondence regarding Maxwell representation
events.description: Assistant U.S. Attorney emails defense attorneys Chris and Mark to arrange a meeting regarding their representation of Ghislaine Maxwell in the SDNY Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: The email shows communication between SDNY prosecutors and defense attorneys for Ghislaine Maxwell in July 2019 regarding the Epstein investigation.
The subject line explicitly references 'SDNY investigation (re: Epstein)', confirming the ongoing federal investigation.
The prosecutors are arranging a meeting with Maxwell's attorneys, indicating active legal proceedings.
The email demonstrates coordination between defense counsel and prosecutors regarding next steps in the investigation.
